Name: A Fist for a Fist
Effects: Each time the Hekaton gains a Wound (a Double Wound is treated as 2 Wounds) place a token on this Trait. If there are 3 or more tokens on this Trait, finish resolving the current action, discard all tokens, then perform Signature

Name: A Wall of Fists
Effects: Titans cannot voluntarily move into spaces adjacent to the Hekaton

Name: Aggressive Expansion
Effects: <Start of Primordial Round> @WoO {Airburst 3}

Name: Antisherpa
Effects: Titans in columns 1-7 are dealt +2 @Danger per hit. Titans in columns 8-15 are dealt +1 @Danger per hit

Name: Ariadne's Logic
Effects: When attacked from a Labyrinth tiles, Temenos has -1 @AT

Name: Bane of Odysseus
Effects: If you don't pass the [Trojan Ire|DZ2589] card, die. Then, random Titan gains the _Trojan Ire_

Name: Beginning of the End
Effects: <End of Primordial Round> Before {End of Hope}, draw and perform another AI card

Name: Black Rain
Effects: <Start of Titan turn> If you are in front of the Chimera, unless you have an Umbrella @Gear card, gain 1 Ambrosia token

Name: Black Soup
Effects: If you fail to find the Primordial during the Titan Round, every Titan dies

Name: Black Sun
Effects: If you are hit by _Merciless Sun_, you are incinerated

Name: Blacker Than The Night
Effects: When the Primordial performs {Vanish X}, it doesn't ignore the Board Edges directly across from the Target or attacking Titan

Name: Bleed Your Heart Out
Effects: Each Bleeding token gives you -1 @Speed. {Bleeding Limit -1}

Name: Blinding Shine
Effects: The Old Haunt cannot be Wounded from the front

Name: Bloodlost
Effects: <Start of Battle> Starting from the highest @Danger and continuing in descending order, Titans suffer: {Bleeding 4}, Bleeding 3, Bleeding 2, and Bleeding 2. This Trait overrides the Start of Battle effect of the [Predator|CX1681] Trait

Name: Bow or Die
Effects: If you don't start the Primordial Round knocked down, you are incinerated

Name: Bred for War
Effects: *Additional Setp:* Place a Combo token on the Maul space of the Combo track. After resolving a Combo or Combo Break, move the token clockwise to the next space.<<NL>>*Combo:* After resolving the first AI card in a Round, perform @WoO *Combo:* Draw and resolve another AI card.<<NL>><Reaction> *Combo Break:* A Titan who is *not the* @PriorityTarget Priority Target, and has @Gear with a Weapon class indicated by the Combo track, may exhaust this Weapon to break the Combo. The Titan must be within this Weapon's effective range. It gains the @PriortyTarget token.<<NL>>*Note:* @Rage gain doesn't trigger @PriorityTarget change

Name: Built for Eternity
Effects: The Endless Staircase has 18 spaces

Name: Built to Be Broken
Effects: Each time you fail to wound, lock the highest unlocked Endless Staircase tier. All Titans on that Staircase tier die

Name: By Any Other Name
Effects: The Blackbeak is a Hermesian Pursuer with modified attributes and Traits as denoted on this card and an additional Flare card. The [Toying|EX3219] and {Tease} Traits are disabled. Permanently remove the [Black-blood Cryptex|AS0581] BP card from its BP deck

Name: Cackle
Effects: When a Titan becomes adjacent to the Hermesian Pursuer, they gain the [Fear|AL0299] Condition card

Name: Candle in the Dark
Effects: If your Light X is lower than the Primordial level divided by 2 (rounding up), Skitter loses @WoO

Name: Cannot Hide from the Sun
Effects: Titan with the @PriorityTarget Priority Target token cannot be shaded in any way

Name: Cities of Gold
Effects: When a Terrain tile is displaced as a result of the Midascore's movement, place a generic token on that tile. If a Titan starts or ends their turn on a Terrain tile, they gain 1 Midas token for each generic token on that tile

Name: Clever Boy
Effects: Board Edges gain Boundless: they are now high cliffs. If a Titan is moved beyond the edge, they die

Name: Contaminated Cuts
Effects: <End of Titan turn> Gain @Danger equal to the number of Ambrosia tokens you have

Name: Crimson Tide
Effects: <Start of Primordial Round> Perform Routine

Name: Critical Mass
Effects: Each time the Chimera gains a Wound on the *Secondary Wound Stack* or you *OoR evade*, place a generic token on this Trait. If there are 3 or more tokens on this Trait, finish resolving the current action, discard all tokens, then draw and resolve the top AI card

Name: Curse Carapace
Effects: The Demidjinn gains +1 @AT for every [Wishkeen|DL2011] and [Wishagog|DL2011] Condition card in play (but not on dead Titans)

Name: Danger Sense
Effects: The D letters on the Primordial Diagram mark the Danger Zone spaces. If a Titan moves through or into the Danger Zone during the Titan Round, roll a d10. On a 7+, they manage to get through. Otherwise, tehy immediately stop and the Nietzschean performs Signature against that Titan. Ignore this Trait during a Nietzschean Attack

Name: Darkness Comes With Me
Effects: After the Pursuer moves, but before it Attack, every Titan in any of the 2 rows of spaces behind the Pursuer sufferes Unavoidable Knockback 7 (regardless of adjacency)

Name: Dealbreaker Stance
Effects: Use this Combo Track instead of the regular one. Sword: Knife, Shield. Fire: Spear, Sword, Cestus. Ambrosia: Club, Axe. Hatred: Whip, Bow, Slabsword

Name: Debts of Succession
Effects: Double all Midas token gains. When a Titan dies, after placing half of their Midas tokens on [Incremental Painment|DX3222], distribute the rest of the tokens evenly among all other Titans

Name: Deep Cut
Effects: <End of Titan Turn> Gain @Danger equal to the number of Bleeding tokens you have

Name: Deeper Depths
Effects: Each Titan starts the Battle with 1 Oxygen token less

Name: Devour Whole
Effects: <Start of Primordial Round> {Consume} all Titans adjacent to the Icarian Harpy

Name: Digestive Acids
Effects: <End of Primordial Round> Each Titan gains as many @Danger as they have Ambrosia tokens

Name: Dissipate
Effects: Move the Dahaka to the closest [Ambrosia Cloud|DI2031] Terrain tile other than the one it is currently on, so that its base is fully placed on the Terrain tile, then turn it to face the most Titans

Name: Djinnian Determination
Effects: When the Demidjinn is about to perform Wish Away, turn it toward the closest Board Edge

Name: Djinnian Precision
Effects: Each Wish Away must be performed to the Irem Tower that is exactly X spaces from the Demidjinn, where X is the Wish Away value

Name: Doom of the Centimanes
Effects: If you're not adjacent to another Titan, you cannot use @Fate to re-roll your Attack Rolls, Evasion Rolls, and Judgement tests. If you're not adjacent to another Titan and you fully miss an Attack, you die

Name: Dragon of the Lightless Void
Effects: You can only use X amount of Opening or Closing tokens from the Kratos Pool. You can only use X amount of Break, Fire, Black, and Hope tokens from the Kratos Pool combined. X is equal to your Light X keyword

Name: Dreadnought
Effects: During the Titan Round, Cyclonus can only be Wounded from its Blindspot. Combos can be broken only from the Blindspot

Name: Drift
Effects: When the Dahaka performs Drift, it moves through the Target stopping directly across the Target, then turns to face them. If the Dahaka cannot Drift across the Target, it stops adjacent to the Target and the Target dies. If the Dahaka moves through a Titan during Drift, that Titan gains a negative Precision token. Drift does not cause Crash

Name: Drifter of Wastes
Effects: The Dahaka ignores Line of Sight. The Dahaka has the following unique movement abilities: {Drift}, {Dissipate}

Name: End of Hope
Effects: End of Primordial Round: Perform Signature

Name: Endless Escalator
Effects: When there is at least one Titan in the Endless Staircase, at the start of the Primordial Round, move the lowest segment of the Endless Staircase to the top. Titans on the lowest segment die

Name: Endless Staircase
Effects: This fight uses the Endless Staircase (see Cycle IV Storybook for details). The Staircase has a number of tiers equal to the Primordial level (max. 4)

Name: Endless Wish
Effects: Every Attack becomes a Wish Attack in addition to its other types

Name: Enriched Toxins
Effects: Whenever a Titan would gain one or more Ambrosia tokens, they additionally gain 1 Midas token

Name: Extinguish Possibilities
Effects: <Start of Primordial Round> Look at the top Trauma card from each deck. If it's positive, remove it from the Battle. If it's negative, leave it on top

Name: Extradimensional Trample
Effects: Ignore @WoO preceeding Trample Responses. Treat all Labyrinthauros Movement as having the following ability: If the Labyrinthauros moves through a knocked down Titan, it dies

Name: Eye for an Eye
Effects: Each time Cyclonus gains a Wound (a Double Wound is treated as 2 Wounds) or performs an unbroken Combo, place a token on this Trait. If there are 4 or more tokens on this Trait, finish resolving the current action, discard all tokens, then draw and resolve the top AI card

Name: Fate of a Debtor
Effects: When a Titan gains Midas tokens, each other Titan gains the same amount of Midas tokens

Name: Fate of All Cowards
Effects: When a Titan voluntarily moves away from the Nietzschean, the Nietzschean immediately performs Signature against that Titan

Name: Fear is Constant
Effects: <Start of Battle> Chosen Titan gains the [Fear|AL0299] Condition card, another Titan gains the [Terror|EL2596] Condition card, a third one flips 1 Oxygen token

Name: Feedback Loop
Effects: Each time you use {Wish Armor} against an AI Attack, place 1 token on the [Wish for a Wish|DX3223] Trait

Name: Fissurebuilder
Effects: Treat all Labyrinth tiles as Maze Fissure tiles

Name: Fissures
Effects: *Additional Setup:* Alternate Battle Diagram. If you are playing an Ambush Battle, replace the Labyrinth tiles with Maze Fissure tiles of the corresponding size and shape

Name: Flawless
Effects: Disable the _All for One_ Trait

Name: Fleet of Hands
Effects: +1 to all Pushbacks and +2 to all Knockbacks performed by the Hekaton

Name: Flickering Wishes
Effects: Perform the "Start of Primordial Round" effect of the Global Wish Trait after every Attack (Demidjinn and Titan) instead

Name: Forbidden Alchemy
Effects: When you gain Ambrosia tokens in any way, double the amount gained

Name: Friendly Warning
Effects: -2 to all Knockbacks performed by the Hekaton

Name: Gaze of the Void
Effects: <Start of Primordial Round (except 1st)> All Titans in front of the Oracle die

Name: Global Wish
Effects: *Additional Setup:* Take all Global Wish cards with a level that is equal to or lower than the current Demidjinn level, shuffle them, and place them face up on the Global Wish stack. <Start of Primordial Round (ignore during the first round)> Place the top card from the Global Wish stack in the Active Global Wish space, discarding any card that was already on it. Then, if there are no cards on the Global Wish stack, shuffle all discard Global Wish cards and place them face up on the Global Wish stack. If a Global Wish card is on the Active Global Wish space, it takes effect during both the Primordial and Titan Rounds

Name: God Among Men
Effects: The Nietzschean performs his Round after 2 Titan turns. Then the other 2 Titans go, then the Nietzschean, then the players can rearrange their playing order

Name: God Given Law
Effects: Ignore @WoO preceding _Merciless Sun_

Name: God Taken Law
Effects: When an [Irem Tower|DI2028] is destroyed, each Titan adjacent to it is dealt X @Danger, where X is the number of Towers already removed

Name: Gods Don't Look Back
Effects: Titans attacking from the Blindspot have an additional +1 Precision

Name: Goldtaste
Effects: Argonauts with the Goldthirst Curse Affliction must apply all @Fate+ or @Midas+ effects regardless of their actual @Fate or @Midas

Name: Head to Head
Effects: You cannot attack the Hermesian Pursuer unless you're adjacent to it

Name: Headhunter
Effects: If you have a Cryptex, resolve your Trauma Draw as if you crossed the next threshold on your Trauma Table (or Massive Danger chart). Each Time a Titan dies, the Hermesian Pursuer performs Heal (if possible)

Name: Heat Death
Effects: Primordial doesn't destroy [Petrified Vent|EI2606] Terrain tiles it moves through. Primordial's Crash causes incineration

Name: Heavenward
Effects: When you are instructed to create an Irem Tower, place it on any empty Battle Board space not adjacent to any other Terrain tile.<<NL>>When you are instructed to remove an Irem Tower, remove an Irem Tower Terrain tile closest to the Babelian Lunacy

Name: Hyperaggression
Effects: Add +1 to all Pushbacks and Pulls and +2 to all Knockbacks performed by the Cyclonus

Name: Hypertimefront
Effects: Level 3: When the Timefront moves, it moves 4 spaces forward instead.<<NL>>Level 4+: When the Timefront moves, it moves 5 spaces forward instead

Name: Ice Age
Effects: Treat every Battle Board space as if it had the {Slippery} keyword

Name: Icecapade
Effects: Disable abilities that allow to treat Slippery tiles as one tile. If you end the Primordial Round or your Titan turn on a Slippery space, move towards the lowest colu,m until you are no longer on a Slippery space. *Additional Setup:* Alternate Battle Diagram

Name: Imminent Destruction
Effects: <End of Titan turn> If you didn't Attack this turn, resolve the top AI card

Name: Imperial Impetus
Effects: *Imperial Impetus:* The Midascore moves X spaces in a straight line. X is equal to 7 + the Primordial LVL (max. 11). If the Midascore moves through or ends its move on a knocked down Titan, that Titan draws an Obol. When a Titan suffers Crash as a result of Imperial Impetus, they additionally gain 1 Midas token.

Name: Imperial Leap
Effects: This Trait replaces the {Imperial Impetus} Trait and the effects of the {Imperial Impetus} keyword. *Imperial Impetus*: Place an [Ambrosia Cloud|DI2031] Terrain tile beneath the Nosoi Dragon. The Nosoi Dragon moves onto the [Irem Tower|DI2028] Terrain tile in front that is at least 11 spaces away from it. Then, all Titans in Zone 2 from the Nosoi Dragon gain 1 Ambrosia token and draw an Obol. This movement does not cause Crash. If the Nosoi Dragon cannot perform Imperial Impetus, move it onto the closest Ambrosia Cloud (if able) and perform Routine

Name: Incorpreal Wraith
Effects: The Dahaka can only be Wounded by Interrupt Attacks. Always use the higher @AT value of the BP cards

Name: Insatiable Pull
Effects: <End of Primordial Round> Pull each Titan X spaces, where X is the number of Ambrosia tokens they have. If you are pulled adjacent to the Chimera and the Pull value was not lowered to 0, instead of continuing the Pull, you are Absorbed

Name: Invisible Flame
Effects: When you climb the VP, and when you start your turn on the VP, gain 1 Ambrosia token and 1 Pain token

Name: Labyrinth X
Effects: *Additional Setup:* Place a Labyrinth token on the topmost space of the Labyrinth track.<<NL>>*Labyrinth X:* Place X [Labyrinth|AI0364] Terrain tiles adjacent to and in front of the Primordial. Use the tile shape that corresponds to the token's location on the track, then move the token clockwise to the next space

Name: Land That Knows Nothing of the Sea
Effects: When you gain [The Oar|DZ2585] card, immediately flip it

Name: Layover
Effects: <Start of Titan Round> The Titan with the most @Fate is moved to the [Omega Terminus|CR1365]

Name: Leleges Spin
Effects: <Start of Primordial Round> Place one generic token on this Trait. Signature becomes a Zone Attack performed in Zone X, where X is the number of tokens on this Trait

Name: Light is Dimming
Effects: If you don't have any {Light X} keyword, you are always considered to be attacked from behind

Name: Lightspeeder
Effects: Ignore @WoO preceeding Move and Attack instructions

Name: Living Fortress
Effects: You can only Wound the Chimera from a VP or when Absorbed

Name: Living Tornado
Effects: The Demidjinn ignores Line of Sight. It does not destroy Terrain tiles, unless stated otherwise

Name: Loss of Liquidity
Effects: Each Midas token on a non-Weapon @Gear lowers your @Speed and Hermes Move by 1. If you don't move during your Titan turn, you die

Name: Magnifying Glass
Effects: All VPs becomes unshaded. After a Titan fails a Hold On test, perform Signature against that Titan

Name: Make the Sun Move and the Earth Stand Still
Effects: At the end of the Primordial Round, the Old Haunt appears at the closest Sun Circle

Name: Maze Hyperactive Armor
Effects: All BP cards without a Wound Response gain: Wound: @WoO {Trample}

Name: Maze Reactive Armor
Effects: All BP cards without a Fail Response gain: Fail: Gain +1 @Danger. Labyrinthauros turns towards the Attacker, Labyrinth 1

Name: Maze Reconfiguration
Effects: When Temenos is instructed to place a Labyrinth tile under a Titan that is already on a Labyrinth tiles, that Titan draws an Obol instead

Name: Mazebuilder
Effects: After performing Trample from a Response, immediately perform Labyrinth 1

Name: Mazesense
Effects: Labyrinth tiles do not block this Primordial's Line of Sight. Argonauts with the Mazetouched Affliction must apply all @Fate X+ banner effects, regardless of their actual @Fate

Name: Megaton
Effects: After End of Hope, draw and perform another AI card

Name: Merciless Sun
Effects: <Start of Primordial Round> Perform [Merciless Sun]

Name: Metamorphosis
Effects: The Chimera's physical state is indicated by the last wounded BP card. At the start of Battle, the Chimera has no state. When you deal a Wound, move the State token to the state designated on that card.<<NL>>*Gelatinous:* If attacked with a Weapon other than _Club, Cestus, Slabsword_, or _Shield_, the Chimera has +1 @AT.<<NL>>*Supersolid:* If attacked with a _Club, Cestus, Slabsword_, or _Shield_ Weapon, the Chimera has +1 @AT.<<NL>>Level 4+: +2 @AT instead.<<NL>>*Corrosive:* After you resolve a successful Attack (at least 1 hit), if your Weapon is not _Stone, Relief, Divine, Hephaestum, Cyclopean, Mythic_, or _Electrum_, exhaust it and gain @Danger equal to the Chimera LVL

Name: Microwave Shield
Effects: Before performing an Attack Roll, for each space between you and the Primordial, discard 1 token from the Kratos Pool

Name: Moirai Vault
Effects: Place stolen @Gear, Mnemos cards, and @Progress tokens on this Trait, note stolen Mnemos nodes, Game elements placed here cannot be used in any way. If you do not reclaim them until the end of Battle, they are permanently lost. If you Wound a Fateless Eye BP, instead of dealing a Wound, you may take 1 thing from the Moirai Vault. Then discard the BP card and gain +1 @Fate

Name: Mothwing Trance
Effects: If you're in front of the Pursuer, you cannot re-roll your Attack Rolls, Evasion Rolls, and Judgement tests

Name: Mountain of Madness
Effects: Treat the Cliffs marked as red on the diagram as Boundless Board Edges

Name: Nap of the Vent
Effects: Primordial destroys [Petrified Vent|EI2606] Terrain tiles it moves through

Name: Nemesis Vow
Effects: When you are about to draw a Flare card, each Titan gains 1 Ambrosia token

Name: No Missed Chances
Effects: When a Titan performs a Full Evade or reduces all @Danger from an Attack to 0, perform Signature

Name: No Quarter
Effects: If a Titan has to resolve an Obol Draw, they die instead

Name: Not Yet
Effects: Disable Rewind. Cycle II only

Name: Omega Terminus
Effects: *Additional Setup:* Place the [Omega Terminus|CR1365] Status card near the Primordial Sheet. Instead of the normal effect, a Titan that suffers Crash is immediately moved onto that card

Name: Once Upon a Time
Effects: Each time the Oracle consumes a Time Anchor or gains a Wound (a Double Wound is treated as 2 Wounds), place a token on this Trait. After resolving the current action, when there are 4 or more tokens on this Trait, discard all tokens, then draw and resolve the top AI card

Name: One Fool at a Time
Effects: When a Titan enters the Endless Staircase, the Staircase Entrance disappears!

Name: Original Trench
Effects: Normal (not Terrain) Battle Board spaces are considered Terrain tiles with the {Chasm} keyword. All other Terrain is considered {Elevated}

Name: Overclocked
Effects: Ignore @WoO preceding Laser Attacks

Name: Pale Grin of Death
Effects: When you are attacked from behind, ignore the Evasion Roll. You are immediately devoured (dead)

Name: Pale Grin of Doom
Effects: When you are attacked from behind, ignore the Evasion Roll; the Attack automatically hits with all the dice

Name: Perfection
Effects: <End of Titan Round> Place an additional generic token on top of any Rapid Adaptation Token on the Icarian Adaptation Board. This Adaptation token cannot be moved or removed until the end of Battle

Name: Pollution Aura
Effects: Each Titan starts the Battle with 1 Oxygen token. If a Titan ends their turn in Zone 2 from the Nosoi Dragon, they discard 1 Oxygen token and gain 1 Ambrosia token. If, at any point, you must discard an Oxygen token and you don't have any, you die. Note; Do not use Cycle V Oxygen token rules

Name: Primordial Plasma
Effects: From now on, if there are no Wound cards in the Wound Stack or the last card is a Single of Double Wound, the Chimera's state is *Plasmous*<<NL>>*Plasmous:* If attacked with a Weapon other than _Primordial, DIvine, Mythic_, or _Eldertech_, the Chimera has +2 @AT and you exhaust your Weapon after resolving this Attack

Name: Psychosomatic Poisoning
Effects: When you gain a Condition card, and each time you start your turn with a Condition card, gain 1 Ambrosia token

Name: Quantum Eye
Effects: If you reveal a BP card with this open-eyed symbol as a result of a card or an ability effect (not during a normal BP Draw), gain @Fate equal to the BP card's level. *This is a Permanent Rule: From now on, this Trait is added to every Battle in the game, regardless of the Primordial or Cycle! Even to new campaigns!*

Name: Quantumfront
Effects: When the Timefront moves, it moves 6 spaces instead

Name: Ram of Fists
Effects: Disable all @WoO preceding Knockbacks

Name: Refuse Credit
Effects: Disable the {Shifting} Keyword on Terrain tiles. The Midascore destroys Irem Towers during movement

Name: Regurgitate
Effects: *Regurgitate:* Place an [Ambrosia Pool|AI0371] Terrain tile beneath the Primordial.<<NL>>Level 2+: Treat all Ambrosia Pools as [Black Glaciers|CI1316]

Name: Relentless Anxiety
Effects: When the Primordial vanishes, immediately draw an AI card

Name: Roost Battle
Effects: Board Edges gain Boundless: they are now high cliffs. If a Titan is moved beyond the edge, they die

Name: Rupture Veins
Effects: Instead of the normal Bleeding Build-up, gain as many Bleeding tokens as there are Bleeding tokens on your Titan

Name: Ruthless
Effects: Remove all positive Trauma cards from the Trauma decks (except Obols)

Name: Sandstorm Spiral
Effects: *Sandstorm Spiral:* If adjacent to a Target, the Demidjinn moves clockwise around the Target, so that it ends up on four spaces directly across the Target. If the movement is blocked by a Board Edge, the Demidjinn moves 6 spaces directly away from the Target without turning instead

Name: Scourge of the Centimanes
Effects: All BP cards without a Wound Response gain: Wound: @WoO Pushback 3. Fail: Knockback 5

Name: Semicorporeal Wraith
Effects: When the special @GoldWoO comes up, a Titan adjacent to the Dahaka may perform an Interrupt Attack. If they do, they gain a @CombatAction Fatigue token. Bonus Attacks are always Interrupt Attacks (but you do not gain the Fatigue token). Chain Break doesn't disable the special @GoldWoO

Name: Shackles of Regret
Effects: Apply the following modifiers to all Dahaka Attacks: -1 @d10 and -1 @Danger per hit (minimum 1). As long as this Trait is active, the End of Hope Trait is disabled

Name: Shadow and the Flame
Effects: Attacks that don't normally deal Ambrosia, deal 1 Ambrosia token

Name: Shadow Backstep
Effects: When the Dahaka Shadowsteps through the Board Edge, the Dahaka performs {Heal}

Name: Shadow in the Skies
Effects: The Midascore ignores Line of Sight. During movement it does not destroyt Terrain tiles, unless stated otherwise

Name: Shadowstep X
Effects: The Dahaka moves X spaces directly away from the Target, without turning. If it would move past the Board Edge, it appears on the other side of the Board in a straight line from its previous position and continues the movement in the same direction

Name: Sisyphus's Spiral
Effects: When the Burden moves adjacent to its Target, if it is not above the Target (i.e. isn't positioned in solely higher-numbered columns than the Target), it swivels clockwise around the Target, so that it ends up on the four spaces directly above the Target. If the movement is blocked by the Board Edge, the Burden moves onto the Target's space instead and the Target is Displaced onto a lower space adjacent to the Burden (this may results in being displaced 2 spaces!)

Name: Slippery Slope
Effects: +3 to all Kickbacks performed by the Burden

Name: Snail of Nothing
Effects: Each time Temenos gains a Wound, it gains 1 positive @AT token. Next time you resolve an AI card, discard all of the @AT tokens and add that many @Danger to the @Danger dealt by that Attack

Name: Song of Great Fear
Effects: Each time you gain a Despair token, you also gain the [Fear|AL0299] Condition card

Name: Soulrend
Effects: Lose 1 Mnemos node from every Mnemos

Name: Soundspeed Impetus
Effects: If the Midascore moves through or ends it move on a knocked down or floating Titan, that Titan dies

Name: Splash
Effects: When a Titan suffers Crash as a result of Primordial movement, they additionally gain 1 Ambrosia token

Name: Spontaneous Supernova
Effects: When the Old Haunt appears at a Sun Circle, all unshaded Titans are incinerated and destroy any Terrain tile that shaded a Titan, even if indestructible

Name: Starfish
Effects: <Start of Primordial Round> If the Hekaton is adjacent to 2 or more Titans, all of those Titans suffer Knockback 5

Name: Stay Your Hand
Effects: Each Nietzschean Attack does 1 @Danger less

Name: Sunken Costs
Effects: <End of Primordial Round> Gain @Danger equal to the number of Midas tokens you have

Name: Supersonic Punch
Effects: If you are pushed into an Obstacle, you die. *Additional Setup:* Alternate Battle Diagram, see Mnestis Battle Diagrams in the Rulebook

Name: Symphony of Despair
Effects: <Start of Titan Turn> Gain 1 Despair token

Name: Temporal Ruthlessness
Effects: If you draw a positive Trauma card or an Obol, ignore it and draw again (once per Draw)

Name: Tentacled Monstrosity
Effects: +3 to all Pulls performed by the Harpy

Name: The Dragon Does Not Sleep
Effects: *Additional Setup:* Place a Combo token on the Cleaver space of the Combo track. After resolving a Combo or Combo Break, move the token clockwise to the next space.<<NL>>*Combo:* Dahaka AI card cannot be Interrupt Attacked, unless you perform a Combo Break.<<NL>>@WoO *Combo Break:* A Titan who is not the @PriorityTarget PriorityTarget and has a @Gear with a Weapon class indicated by the Combo track may exhaust this Weapon to break the Combo. The Titan must be within this Weapon's effective range. They gain the @PriorityTarget token. *Note:* @Rage gain doesn't trigger @PriorityTarget change

Name: The Game is Rigged
Effects: If a Titan ends their turn with the [Sisyphean|BL0673] Condition, they die. <End of Primordial Round> Burden performs Heal

Name: The Last
Effects: *Battle Setup:* Place the special [AI 0|DR2456] card at the bottom of the AI deck. It is never shuffled or discard. *After Escalation:* If the top AI card is not an AI IV or AI 0, discard it (once per Escalation)

Name: The Strong Eat
Effects: *Additional Setup:* Add 1 _You died_ Obol to the Obol deck

Name: Thread Lightly
Effects: If you fail an Ascent Check, draw an Obol

Name: Three Point Six
Effects: When a Titan becomes adjacent to the Chimera, they gain 1 Ambrosia token. When a Titan is Absorbed, they immediately gain 1 Ambrosia token. When a Titan ends their turn on a VP, they gain 1 Ambrosia token

Name: Three Seconds
Effects: Ignore @WoO preceding Microwave Attacks

Name: Ties That Bind Us
Effects: Titans can involuntarily moved outside the Tethered limit. If at any point a Titan is outside the Tethered limit, it treats all spaces as Chasms until it returns within the limit

Name: Tigerback
Effects: To leave the VP voluntarily, you need to pass a Climb Down test (same difficulty as the Climb test)

Name: Timefront Beckons
Effects: <Start of Battle> Place the Timefront tiles on the bottom column (1). <End of Titan Round> @WoO Move the Timefront 3 spaces up (towards the highest column). If the Timefront moves onto a space occupied by a Titan, this Titan is erased from existence. If the Timefront moves onto a space with a Terrain tile, this tile is destroyed (unless Indestructible). When the Timefront is about to move onto a space occupied by the Primordial, move the Primordial directly away from the Timefront to enable full Timefront movement

Name: Total Eclipse
Effects: Treat every Battle Board space as if it had the {Chasm} keyword

Name: Tower of Madness
Effects: At the start of the Battle, the Endless Staircase and all VPs are locked, which means you cannot enter them in any way. Each Wound you deal from outside the Endless Staircase unnlocks an Endless Staircase tier up to the current Battle's tier limit. When all tiers are unlocked, you start to unlock VPs.<<NL>>You can only wound a BP III card from a VP

Name: Trample
Effects: *Trample:* Labyrinthauros moves forward in a straight line at full @Speed, then turns to face the most Titans. If it moves through or ends its move on a knocked down Titan, that Titan draws an Obol

Name: Trigger Happy
Effects: The Signature becomes [Trigger Finger|CV1800] (you know which one)

Name: True Babylon
Effects: <Start of Battle> Each player chooses a different language. For the duration of the Battle, they can only speak in their chosen language. For each word spoken in a different language, they gain +1 @Fate

Name: Truth or Death
Effects: Before performing a Scan, declare if the Primordial is there. If you are not correct, after resolving the Scan, draw an Obol

Name: Unbeatable Guard
Effects: During the Titan Round, Cyclonus cannot be Wounded from the front and Combos cannot be broken from the front. Ignore this Trait during a Cyclonus Attack

Name: Unholy Inflation
Effects: When you are about to suffer Knockdown, if you have 3+ MIdas tokens, suffer Float instead. When you are about to suffer Float, if you have the Windblight Curse Affliction, you die instead

Name: Unworthy Will Die
Effects: At the end of the Primordial Round, the Old Haunt destroys the closest [Irem Tower|DI2028]

Name: Vanish X
Effects: Move the Primordial X spaces towards the closest Board Edge, without turning, ignoring Board Edges directly across from the Target or attacking Titan. If thes would move the Primordial beyond a Board Edge or outside of all ranges of light, it disappears. When the Primordial is outside the Battle Board, it cannot be affected in any way

Name: Voracious Bog
Effects: During the Primordial Round, Ambrosia Pools and Ambrosia Trails have the {Chasm} keyword. If a Titan ends their turn on an Ambrosia Pool or Ambrosia Trail tile, they die, consumed by the living abyss

Name: Voracious Parasite
Effects: The Hypertime Oracle consumes all Time Anchors it moves through and all Time Anchors it is adjacent to at the end of the Primordial Round. Remove consumed Time Anchors from the Battle Board

Name: Weapon Master
Effects: *Additional Setp:* Place a Combo token on the Sword space of the Combo track. After resolving a Combo or Combo Break, move the token clockwise to the next space.<<NL>>*Combo:* After resolving the first AI card in a Round, perform @WoO *Combo:* Draw and resolve another AI card.<<NL>><Reaction> *Combo Break:* A Titan who is *not the* @PriorityTarget Priority Target, and has @Gear with a Weapon class indicated by the Combo track, may exhaust this Weapon to break the Combo. The Titan must be within this Weapon's effective range. It gains the @PriortyTarget token.<<NL>>*Inevitable:* If the Nietzschean has 6+ Wounds, Sword Combos cannot be broken. If the Nietzschean has 10+ Wounds, Fire Combos cannot be broken.<<NL>>*Note:* @Rage gain doesn't trigger @PriorityTarget change

Name: Weight of Greed
Effects: When a Titan with Midas tokens dies, place half of their Midas tokens (rounding up) on the [Incremental Painment|DX3222] Trait

Name: Win Together Die Alone
Effects: <Start of Titan Turn> If you're not adjacent to another Titan, gain +2 @Danger and +2 @Fate

Name: Winnowing
Effects: Remove the [Fearful Hospitality|DZ2584] card and add the [Trojan Ire|DZ2589] and [The Oar|DZ2585] cards to the Battle (See Cycle IV Storybook, pg. 171)

Name: Wish Away
Effects: When the Primordial performs Wish Away, it performs Wish Away X, where X is 8 + the Primordial level (max. 12)

Name: Wishtanglement
Effects: When you gain a [Wishkeen|DL2011] or [Wishagog|DL2011] Condition card, every other Titan gains the same Condition card

Name: Worm of the Labyrinth
Effects: Temenos can only be attacked from the white spaces marked on the diagram or the VP
